summary: Build an Instagram-like social app (web + Android APK) with user accounts, account search, 1:1 chat, posts/stories/reels with persistent storage, plus games, music, study tools, AI tools, and a chatbot; update UI to be mobile-like with a simplified header (single line) and a horizontal functional-button menu; add password-locked rooms (notification room + admin controls), user music uploads, and allow users to delete their own content.
architectural_notes: App must persist user-uploaded media (posts/stories/reels) and chat history so it reappears after re-login.
Requires authentication + user identity system and storage backend for media and messages.
Deliver both web deployment and Android APK build pipeline as part of deliverables.
Add mobile-first responsive design and touch-friendly UI patterns so the web app behaves like a mobile app on phones (navigation, layouts, tap targets).
Header requirement updated: replace previous required header lines with a single line exactly "created by Piyush Singh" and render the text in black.
Add a horizontally-scrollable functional menu bar below the header for quick access to: Whiteboard, AI Image Generation, AI Writing, Chatbot.
Implement password-gated rooms: a global room accessible via password for notifications/info, plus a separate admin-password gate ("piyush13775") that enables user moderation (remove users).
Music section must support user audio uploads with persistent storage.
Deletion permissions: users can delete only their own posts/stories/reels (owner-only).
Support both a global password room and user-created password-protected private rooms.
known_issues: App is not loading for the user (needs investigation and fix).

existing_features.title: Add authentication using Internet Identity and create an in-app user profile model stored in the Motoko canister (display name, username/handle, optional bio, optional avatar image). On first login, prompt the user to create/complete their profile; on subsequent logins, load their existing profile.
Implement user discovery: provide an account search screen that can find profiles by username/handle and allow initiating a 1:1 chat with a selected user.

Implement 1:1 chat with persistent message history stored in the Motoko canister. The chat UI must support sending text messages and viewing conversation history, and it must work across logins (messages reappear after re-authentication).

Implement posts (Instagram-like feed): allow authenticated users to create posts containing caption text and an optional image upload; store posts and images in the Motoko canister and render a feed with newest-first ordering.

Implement Stories: allow authenticated users to create a story with optional image and short text; store and list stories in the Motoko canister, and provide a stories viewer UI. Stories must persist across logins.

Implement Reels (short-form media) as an MVP: allow authenticated users to create a reel entry with a title/caption and either (a) an uploaded small video OR (b) a link field if video storage is not feasible within canister limits; store reel metadata in the Motoko canister and show a reels list/viewer. Reels must persist across logins.

Add a top application header present across all sections with: (1) a left-aligned logo image and (2) the exact text: "owner Piyush Singh for Yash Jay Anush Harsh Abhay". All user-facing UI text must be in English.
Add a Games section containing at least five distinct mini-games that run fully in the browser without external services (e.g., Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory Match, Snake, 2048, and a simple Quiz).

Add a Music section that provides a local, offline-ready music library UI using bundled audio files and metadata (title, artist, region tags like India/Pakistan). Include a clear way to browse and play tracks within the app.

Add a Study Tools section with (A) a whiteboard tool (freehand drawing, colors, eraser, clear board, export to PNG) and (B) a simple PPT-like slide tool (create slides, add text blocks, reorder slides, present/preview).

Add an "AI Tools" section containing: (A) an AI Writing tool implemented as on-device, non-LLM helpers (templates, tone transforms, summarization-style heuristics) and (B) an Image Generator implemented as a local canvas-based generator (e.g., pattern/gradient/shape composition) that can export generated images to PNG. No third-party AI APIs may be used.
Add a small in-app chatbot implemented as a local rules-based assistant (FAQ-style + command shortcuts to navigate features) available from the AI Tools section.
Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) and apply it consistently across all sections. Do not use a blue/purple theme.
Add a static-assets integration for generated images and brand assets: place generated images in frontend/public/assets/generated and ensure the header logo loads from there.
Refactor the main authenticated layout to be mobile-first: on small screens, replace the left sidebar navigation with a fixed bottom tab bar and ensure the content area uses the full width.
Make the header and top-level spacing mobile-optimized so the app feels like a mobile application (compact header, touch-friendly controls, and safe-area handling).

Update key pages/components to be responsive and mobile-friendly (forms, tabs, cards, media areas) by adjusting layouts, typography scale, and spacing for small screens without removing existing functionality.
Add basic Progressive Web App (PWA) support so the site can be installed and launched like a mobile app (manifest + appropriate meta/link tags) using existing generated icons where possible.

Update the top application header to also display the exact additional line: "created by Piyush Singh for Jay Yash Anus Sohan Harsh Abhay" while keeping the existing header line "owner Piyush Singh for Yash Jay Anush Harsh Abhay".

Add an Android packaging/build setup for the existing web app and provide an Android APK build artifact as part of the project deliverables, with clear step-by-step documentation for generating the APK from this repository.

Investigate and fix the 'app is not loading' issue so the deployed web app reliably renders the login screen for logged-out users and the main app layout for logged-in users, without getting stuck on an infinite loading spinner or a blank screen.

Harden frontend startup and actor initialization so that access-control/initialization calls do not block app rendering when optional secrets are missing, and failures are handled gracefully with an actionable English error message.
Produce an Android APK build artifact from this repository using the existing Capacitor Android setup, and include it in the deliverables in a clearly documented location in the repo.

Add a stable in-app download link for the Android APK by serving the APK as a static file from the frontend and exposing an English-labeled 'Download Android APK' link from an appropriate screen (e.g., Login screen and/or a simple About/Info section).

Update/extend the existing Android APK documentation to include: prerequisites, exact build commands, how to copy/place the built APK into the static public download path used by the app, and how to verify the APK opens without a white screen.
Update the top application header to replace the existing multi-line header text with a single line exactly: "created by Piyush Singh" and ensure the header text color is black.
Display the currently logged-in user’s username in the header area, and display the static line "Inbox owner in your account" followed by the static username "psrpiyush" directly below it.

Add a horizontal, horizontally-scrollable functional button bar directly below the header that contains exactly these buttons: "Whiteboard", "AI Image Generation", "AI Writing", and "Chatbot". Only this functional button row should be horizontally scrollable.
Allow an authenticated user to delete their own posts from the feed UI, and persist the deletion in the Motoko canister so the deleted post does not reappear after refresh or re-login.

Allow an authenticated user to delete their own stories from the stories UI, and persist the deletion in the Motoko canister so the deleted story does not reappear after refresh or re-login (even if it has not expired).
Allow an authenticated user to delete their own reels from the reels UI, and persist the deletion in the Motoko canister so the deleted reel does not reappear after refresh or re-login.

Extend the Music section to allow authenticated users to upload their own audio files and store the uploaded audio persistently in the Motoko canister; provide a list and playback UI for the user’s uploaded tracks.

Implement a global password-locked "Notifications & Info" room that any authenticated user can enter by providing the password exactly: "piyush1618rajput1816"; the room shows a shared feed of notifications/information related to users and user accounts (as text entries) stored persistently in the Motoko canister.

Implement an admin-only control mode for the global locked room that is unlocked by entering the admin password exactly: "piyush13775"; in this control mode, a user can remove/ban users from the global room so they can no longer access it even if they know the room password.

Support user-created private password-locked chat rooms: each authenticated user can create a room with a room name and their own password, and only users with that password can enter; messages in these rooms must be stored persistently in the Motoko canister.
Ensure the previously discussed screenshot/screen-recording blocking feature is not implemented (skipped). Do not add any fake "screenshot attempt" buttons or popups.

new_feature_requests.summary: User accounts: sign up/login and persistent user profiles
Account search to find users and start chats
1:1 chat with message persistence across logins
Create/view posts with media upload and persistent storage
Stories feature (create/view) with persistent storage
Reels feature (create/view) with persistent storage
Games section with at least five game types
Music section with many Indian songs and popular Pakistani songs
Study tools section: whiteboard and PPT-like study tool
AI image generation section
AI writing section (generate text/content)
Small chatbot feature
Custom header with text "owner Piyush Singh for Yash Jay Anush Harsh Abhay" and a logo on the left
Deliverables: source code + built Android APK + hosted website link

Persist uploaded media (avatars, post images, story images, and any reel media if supported) and all social data (profiles, posts, stories, reels metadata, chats) in the single Motoko canister, ensuring data remains available after user logout/login and page refresh.
Convert the existing web experience into a mobile-first UI (responsive layout) so it feels like a mobile app when used on phones; ensure usability on mobile screens
Provide a built Android APK file as an explicit deliverable/download (release-ready build artifact)
Fix: App is not loading (investigate and resolve so the deployed build opens correctly)

Produce a fresh, installable Android APK build for the current app using the existing Capacitor Android project, and include the resulting APK in the repository at the exact static path `frontend/public/downloads/caffeine-social.apk` (replacing the existing file if needed).

Verify and keep the in-app APK download flow working from the logged-out experience by ensuring the "Download Android APK" action downloads `/downloads/caffeine-social.apk` successfully in production builds.

Update/complete the Android APK build documentation in `frontend/ANDROID_APK.md` so it contains end-to-end, copy-pastable steps (prerequisites, exact commands, where the release APK output is located, and how to copy it into `frontend/public/downloads/caffeine-social.apk`) and includes a short verification checklist for confirming the APK opens correctly.
Replace existing multi-line header text with a single header line: "created by Piyush Singh" (text color black)
Add a horizontal, horizontally-scrollable functional button bar below the header for: Whiteboard, AI Image Generation, AI Writing, Chatbot

Add password-locked rooms: (1) a global notification/info room accessible to all users with a password, and (2) an admin-only control room unlocked by admin password "piyush13775" that can remove users
Extend Music section to allow users to upload their own audio files (persistent storage)
Allow users to delete their own content: posts, reels, and stories (owner-only deletion)
Support user-created private locked chat rooms (each user can create a password-protected room) in addition to the global password room

projectName: Friend-group social web app (Instagram-like) with posts, stories, reels, search, 1:1 chat, games, music library, and study tools
